replies.bodyText: Thanks for flagging this up. I've removed that vague reference to annotating / approving the KafkaRebalance CR and added a cross-ref to the generating optimization proposals procedure. That procedure now includes an optional step for adding skipHardGoalCheck: true to the CR.
